desc: Art leggings, robes, beanies, dresses for adults and kids printed gemstones. Original boho clothing bohemian. Wear for yoga, lounging, parties. Decor pillows and bedding.

layout.text: where art makes you one of a kind

NONA DRONOVA ART store is a unique artistic bohemian style. The brand is based on an interest in creating original clothing, accessories, and home decor. Designs aesthetics combinations the impression of a blooming garden, gemstones, and a personal mood. Each collection reflects the experience of working with subtle shades of color complemented by the artist's imagination. All clothing, accessories, and interior items are made of high-quality materials in Montreal. Each order will be beautifully packaged and shipped directly from the factory.
